articles.title: Health officials: Here's what to do if you test positive for COVID-19 - KATU
articles.description: The number of new COVID-19 cases are overwhelming public health agencies and officials are having a hard time keeping up. Health officials say if you test positive for the virus, you may not get a call from public health. While their goal is to reach out to e…

articles.author: Miyoung Kim, Roxanne Liu
articles.title: Sinovac's COVID-19 vaccine induces quick immune response - study - Reuters UK
articles.description: Sinovac Biotech's <SVA.O> experimental COVID-19 vaccine CoronaVac triggered a quick immune response but the level of antibodies produced was lower than in people who had recovered from the disease, preliminary trial results showed on Wednesday.

articles.title: Safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of an inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine in healthy adults aged 18–59 years: a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 1/2 clinical trial - The Lancet
articles.description:
Taking safety, immunogenicity, and production capacity into account, the 3 μg dose
of CoronaVac is the suggested dose for efficacy assessment in future phase 3 trials.
